SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT m.`ID` AS sID,1 AS sType,m.Introduce AS sIntroduce,m.Model_Name AS sName,m.IcoUrl AS sIcoUrl,c.CollectionTime,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.CollectionTime) AS CollectionTimeTicks FROM TB_MC_Collection AS c JOIN `TB_MB_Models` AS m ON c.`Source_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE c.User_ID=@@User_ID@@ AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND m.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Source_Type`=1 <%= AND c.`Source_Type`=@@Source_Type@@ %> ORDER BY c.CollectionTime DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>;
UPDATE TB_MC_Collection SET `Status`=FALSE,`ModificationUser`=@@UserAccount@@,`ModificationDate`=NOW() WHERE User_ID=@@User_ID@@ AND Source_ID = @@Source_ID@@ AND Source_Type=@@Source_Type@@;
